General.Name: HK Metals Utama Tbk PT
General.Description: PT HK Metals Utama Tbk manufactures, develop, and trades in building and household materials in Indonesia. It provides various products, including light and stainless steel, aluminum extrusions, PVC pipes, toilet and sanitary wares, and other products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia.
